Class SPiDJwt

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.spid.android.sdk.jwt.SPiDJwt

  • public final class SPiDJwt
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains a JWT (JSON Web token), for more information see the JWT documentation

        Throws:
